name: MOD-020: Compensation - Java/Spring Boot
description: Templates for adding compensation endpoints/interfaces for Domain APIs participating in SAGA orchestration (distributed transactions) aligned to ADR-013.
fetchHint: Read MODULE.md Purpose and template structure; see ERI-CODE-015 for the reference contract.
notes: This module references ADR-013 but ADR-013 is stored under knowledge/ADRs/ rather than modules.
